Name: Ethan Allen Hotel
Description: Modern rooms & suites with flat-screen TVs & iPod docks, plus an outdoor pool & a restaurant/lounge.

Name: Bedford Post Inn
Description: Posh historic inn, owned by Richard Gere, with luxe rooms, a yoga studio & 2 notable eateries.

Name: Hotel Zero Degrees Danbury
Description: Art-filled rooms & a suite in a stylish hotel with a sleek restaurant, a gym & a free local shuttle.

Name: Station Inn Pawling

Name: Hotel Hi-Ho
Description: Modern rooms in a hip hotel offering a lounge & a terrace, plus complimentary parking & breakfast.

Name: Residence Inn Danbury
Description: Straightforward all-suite hotel with an indoor pool, plus free Wi-Fi & hot breakfast.
